sentence: The announcement has caused a firestorm, with far-right, high-profile backers ranging from North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn to conservative activist Candace Owens taking to social media to voice their support for Robby Starbuck, a rival candidate who's been a mainstay of the pro-Trump movement,? Politico's Alex Isenstadt reports.
title: Biden has promises left to keep on his LGBTQ agenda
